id: INSTRUCTIONS: This template shows the correct format for importing letters.
title: INSTRUCTIONS:
Letter from Luis to Maria
content: Dear Maria, I write to you from Santiago...

title: Letter from Maria to Luis
content: Dear Luis, I received your letter...

id: 1. The 'date' field MUST be in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., 1945-03-15)
2. The 'placeFrom' and 'placeTo' fields are important for the geographic map
3. The 'content' field can contain the full text of the letter
4. Use double quotes for fields containing commas or line breaks
5. Leave empty the columns that the system fills automatically
